channel.title: Home School
channel.description: is anyone here home schooled? because i am and i hate it! i like my old school and wish i could go back but my parents wont let me. i had to switch because i did poorly the first semester, but then i got like strait A's and they still wouldnt let me stay! so i have to do it for my sophomore year and i get really distracted by moparscape and moparisthebest because this is so much more fun that school. i still get my work done but it just takes longer. Im in an online school thing, not even the traditional home schooling by mom or w/e. its online and it blows. i told my teachers and they are like, its your first year and you arent even a month in. and i told them that i dont care because i miss my friends and sports. so if your home schooled or have been home schooled, what are your thoughts about it?

item.title: Home School
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

I was home schooled for 2 months, i hated it so much.
Got so bored of it because i only had 4 hours of tutoring a week.
Did no work at all lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Home School
item.dc:creator: @robocz033 robocz033
item.description:
@robocz033 wrote:

lol. i plan on going to med school to be a doctor so, i hope my boss cares about me!

Read full topic

item.title: Home School
item.dc:creator: @killerman93 killerman93
item.description:
@killerman93 wrote:

robocz033:

lol. i still hang out with friends, but i cant as much. and i agree, home schooled people end up socially retarded, thats why only my parents think this is a good idea and stuff. every one else i have talked to says that its dumb and you probably will have social issues later in life, lol. and thats not good cuz im already really shy!

Plus if your homeschooled, there is less chance of you being employed by someone who cares about who works for them.

Read full topic

item.title: Home School
item.dc:creator: @robocz033 robocz033
item.description:
@robocz033 wrote:

i still do good in school. and i didnt know about moparscape when i did bad, actually. i just didnt try. and now i play moparscape more than ever and focus on coding and stuff and i still get like a’s and stuff, i just focus on school for a bit, then take breaks.

Read full topic
